question.body: 75-80% of adrenal medulla hormone secretions is:

response.feedback: Incorrect. Androgens are secreted by the adrenal cortex.
Incorrect. Norepinephrine is secreted by the adrenal medulla but is not the majority of the hormone secretion.
Correct. Epinephrine is the majority of secretion from the adrenal medulla.
Incorrect. Chromaffin are the cells that produce the hormones epinephrine and norepinephrine.
